description: This rule assesses whether an [NetworkInterface] that offers the property [l3Firewall], has [p1:enabled] configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [LoadBalancer] that offers the property [webApplicationFirewall], has [p1:enabled] configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [NetworkInterface] that offers the property [l3Firewall], has [p1:restrictedPorts] configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [MachineLearningModel] has the compliant number of [p1:Vulnerability].
This rule assesses whether an [CodeNotebook] has the compliant number of [p1:Vulnerability].
This rule assesses whether a [SecurityAdvisoryDocument] that offers the property [RemoteDocumentLocation] has a valid filename in the property [p1:path].

This rule assesses whether a [SecurityAdvisoryDocument] that provides the property [RemoteDocumentLocation] is retrievable from a website which has the property [p1:enabled] and [p2:protocol] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Function] that has the property [runtimeLanguage] set to Java, also has the property [p1:runtimeVersion] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Function] that has the property [runtimeLanguage] set to Python, also has the property [p1:runtimeVersion] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Function] that has the property [runtimeLanguage] set to PHP, also has the property [p1:runtimeVersion] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [QPU] has a [OneQubitGateErrorRate] that is below a specified [p1:errorRate] threshold.
This rule assesses whether a [QPU] has [ErrorCorrectionEnabled] [p1:enabled] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [QPU] has a [SPAMErrorRate] that is below a specified [p1:errorRate] threshold.
This rule assesses whether a [QPU] has a [TwoQubitGateErrorRate] that is below a specified [p1:errorRate] threshold.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has the expected value of [p1:vulnerability].
This rule assesses whether an [Application] that offers the property [Functionalities.CryptographicHash], has [p1:algorithm] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [VirtualMachine] has its [BootLogging][p1:enabled] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [VirtualMachine] has the [BootLogging][p1:loggingService] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether any [Resource] has the [ResourceLogging] property [p1:enabled] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [VirtualMachine] has the [OSLogging][p1:retentionPeriod] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [VirtualMachine] has its [OSLogging][p1:enabled] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [VirtualMachine] has its [BootLogging][p1:retentionPeriod] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has its [AnomalyDetection] property [p1:enabled] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether an [DatabaseService] has the [AnomalyDetection][p1:loggingService] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [VirtualMachine] has the [OSLogging][p1:loggingService] property set correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [VirtualMachine] that offers the property [AutomaticUpdates], has [p1:interval] configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [VirtualMachine] that offers the property [MalwareProtection], which in turn has the number of [ApplicationLogging] [LoggingService]s configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [VirtualMachine] that offers the property [MalwareProtection], has [p1:enabled] configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [VirtualMachine] that offers the property [AutomaticUpdates], has [p1:enabled] configured correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has its [TransportEncryption] [p1:cipherSuite] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has [TransportEncryption] [p1:enabled] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has its [TransportEncryption] [p1:protocol] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has [TransportEncryption] [p1:enforced] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has its [TransportEncryption] [p1:dhGroups] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Resource] has its [TransportEncryption] [p1:protocolVersion] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether an [Identity] that has the property [p1:privileged] set respectively, also has the property [enforceMFA] [p2:enabled] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether an [Identity]'s property [lastActivity] is below an allowed time [p1:window].
This rule assesses whether an [Identity] has the property [p1:disablePasswordPolicy] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [ObjectStorage]'s property [p1:publicAccess] is correctly set.
This rule assesses whether a [VirtualMachine] with a non-empty [BlockStorage] that includes the property [atRestEncryption.customerKeyEncryption], has [p1:enabled] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [Storage] has [AtRestEncryption] [p1:enabled] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether a [Storage] has its [AtRestEncryption] [p1:algorithm] correctly configured.
This rule assesses whether an [CodeRepository] has the property [p1:signedCommits] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [CodeRepository] has the property [p1:codeSignoff] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether an [CodeRepository] has the property [p1:signedSignoff] set correctly.
This rule assesses whether a [CodeRepository] has its [p1:approvedCommitAuthorEnforced] property set correctly.
